Publications.title: Exploring The Potential of Large Language Models for Assisting with Mental Health Diagnostic Assessments: The Depression and Anxiety Case
Publications.publication: ACM Transactions on Computing for Healthcare
Publications.description: Explores the use of LLMs in diagnostic assessments for major depressive disorder (MDD) and generalized anxiety disorder (GAD) by guiding them to replicate standard clinical procedures using prompting and fine-tuning techniques, evaluating their agreement with expert-validated diagnoses.

Publications.title: FACTIFY3M: A benchmark for multimodal fact verification with explainability through 5W Question-Answering
Publications.publication: Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP)
Publications.description: A multimodal fake news dataset with 3 million samples designed to enhance scalable fact verification by integrating textual claims, paraphrases, images, visual explainability, 5W QA pairs, and adversarial fake news stories to combat the growing threat of disinformation.
